## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                | Type                                               | Default     |
| --------- | --------- | -------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `size`    | `size`    | The size of the counter    | `"default" \| "mini"`                              | `'default'` |
| `variant` | `variant` | The variant of the counter | `"info" \| "negative" \| "positive" \| "unbiased"` | `'info'`    |
